fields.description: This stylish backpack - with its modern form and subtle colour scheme - is truly one for all occasions. And you can pack it for all occasions, too, thanks to its roomy interior and scores of compartments. A two-way zip opens the largest of them, which houses a sleeve for laptops, while a front pocket and two mesh pouches line the bagâ€™s exterior. The straps are adjustable and padded, and the bottom is covered in sturdy Durabase material.
fields.name: Deck Navy Blue Backpack

fields.description: Keep it stealthy in these men's Basket Classic trainers from Puma. In a black colourway, these trainers are built with a leather upper for durability and a premium look. Featuring a tonal lace up fastening for a locked-in fit, these creps are sat on a tonal low riding midsole for essential cushioning and feature grippy rubber tread underfoot. Finished with a black Puma Formstrip to the sidewalls, and a gold Cat logo to the heel.
